definition: to travel back and forth/to shuttle
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread

sentences.english: Yeah, we need to steal a time machine.
sentences.chinese: 那就是啦，我们要去偷时空穿梭机。

sentences.english: To travels frequently in China and also abroad, on trips to meet donors.
sentences.chinese: 杜聪在中国和国外频繁穿梭旅行，会见捐赠者。

sentences.english: Joyfully swimming in your clear waves.
sentences.chinese: 舒畅地穿梭在你的清波。

sentences.english: Free shuttle bus services to and from Tai Po Market MTR Station is available.
sentences.chinese: 免费穿梭巴士接送往返港铁大埔墟站。

sentences.english: Dozens of servants scurried through the large foyer.
sentences.chinese: 许多仆役在偌大的门厅中快速地穿梭着。

sentences.english: We have time machines handy everywhere in this house.
sentences.chinese: 另外我们手边还有时空穿梭机。

sentences.english: Free shuttle bus service between Trade Fair Center and hotel is available.
sentences.chinese: 交易会期间免费提供穿梭巴士往返交易会会场。

sentences.english: Use shuttle box test to measure the learning and memory ability of each group.
sentences.chinese: 穿梭箱实验检测各组大鼠学习记忆能力。

sentences.english: He refined the whole art of shuttle diplomacy.
sentences.chinese: 他把穿梭外交艺术发展到炉火纯青的地步。

sentences.english: Walking along the stairway, walking through lane, standing on the bridge, thinking about everything.
sentences.chinese: 漫步石径，穿梭小巷，伫立桥头，思绪纷飞。

sentences.english: That 24-hour period constitutes the entire life span of this time traveler.
sentences.chinese: 那24小时期间是这位时空穿梭者一生的时间。

sentences.english: and kind of did like a bar crawl all over the city, so that was a lot of fun.
sentences.chinese: 然后穿梭于城里不同的酒吧中，所以这非常有趣。

sentences.english: At the bottom you'll see Yellowstone River winding through the colorful canyon.
sentences.chinese: 在峡谷底我们可看到黄石河穿梭在五彩缤纷的峡谷中。
小汽车穿梭似的来来往往。

sentences.english: In the back, Crusher saw Yar kneeling next to the shuttlecraft's emergency transporter pad.
sentences.chinese: 舱后，库修看见叶正跪在穿梭机的紧急传送板旁。

sentences.english: Theater students reading a script are oblivious to a mangy dog searching for his dinner.
sentences.chinese: 同学研读剧本，癞痢狗穿梭觅食，互不干扰。

definition: to go through/to bore through/to push one's way through
to wander/to roam about/to loaf about/to be idle
to wander about unhurriedly/to linger/to loiter
the stream flows without stopping (idiom); unending flow
to fly about/to fly hither and thither/to flit/to swarm/to spiral
to flutter/to dance in the breeze
intermittent/now you see it, now you don't
